articles.description: Newcastle United are poised to spend their first money of the summer transfer window as they prepare for their Champions League return.
articles.title: Newcastle United agree fee for Nottingham Forest's Anthony Elanga

articles.description: Jannik Sinner says he cannot accept his progress to the Wimbledon quarter-finals  "as a win" following Grigor Dimitrov's injury heartbreak.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Jannik Sinner says progress 'not a win' after Grigor Dimitrov injury

articles.description: Australia's preparations to face the British and Irish Lions suffer a major setback after first-choice fly-half Noah Lolesio was ruled out of the series.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions tour: Australia's Noah Lolesio ruled out of series

articles.description: Everton closing in on signing Villarreal's France Under-21s striker Thierno Barry in £27m deal
articles.title: Thierno Barry: Everton close to signing Villarreal striker for £27m

articles.description: South Africa’s Wiaan Mulder declares on 367 not out, passing up the opportunity to break Brian Lara’s record for the highest individual score in a Test innings.
articles.title: Wiaan Mulder declares 33 short of Brian Lara's iconic Test innings record of 400

articles.description: In some ways the purest form of the Champions League starts this week - with 28 champions starting in the first qualifying round.
articles.title: Champions League first qualifying round: The long road to Budapest begins

articles.description: Latest transfer news as Newcastle agree a fee with Nottingham Forest to sign winger Anthony Elanga.
articles.title: Transfer news: Newcastle agree fee for Elanga plus Norgaard & Gyokeres latest

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your latest questions after the British Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Oscar Piastri penalty, Charles Leclerc, McLaren, and when is it too wet to race?

articles.description: England teenager Michelle Agyemang has only played 14 minutes of senior international football - but has already made an impression.
articles.title: Michelle Agyemang: Sarina Wiegman says teenager can 'bring something different' to help England at Euro 2025

articles.description: Novak Djokovic battles back from a challenging start to overcome an inspired Alex de Minaur and reach the Wimbledon quarter-finals.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Novak Djokovic battles past Alex de Minaur to reach quarter-finals
